name: Where are my potatoes 2: Land Of Mystery
name_original: Where are my potatoes 2: Land Of Mystery
description:
Game story:


Kake potato character is back in this new third person platformer adventure. Kakes Ufo has crashed in Land of mystery. Kakes mission is to collect different fruits to get steam achievements and also main mission is to find missing potatoes which end kakes journey. There is different puzzles like player need collect bricks which is used to destroy wooden fences. Also player need use drain opener and fire to solve few other puzzles. There are also following enemies which can be killed only by using super smasher hand which weapons is hidden somewhere in map.

Features::

- Steam achievements.
- Following enemies which can be killed with super hand
- Puzzles
- Collect bricks to destroy small fences. Fences need 4-7 bricks to destroy
- Find fruits to get steam achievements
